Name: Richard West and the Golden Mask
About the game: Richard West and the Golden Mask is an adventure game where you need to find the Golden Mask in ancient temples fulfilled with traps, puzzles and mysteries. Use your skills to overcome obstacles and get your objective. Be Richard West and use your skills to climb over the temples and reach your objectives Use your skills to escape from traps along the way Explore ancient temples, with minimalist and beautiful design. Drag blocks, collect items and combine symbols to open doors and reach your goals.
